import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const DifficultyBar = ({ difficulty }) => { const bsDifficultyCols = 'col-3 col-md-2 col-lg-2 col-xl-1' const isActive = (diff) => ( diff === difficulty ) console.log('difficultyBar.js:',difficulty) return( <>
Select difficulty:
Beginner
Intermediate
Extreme
Custom
) } export default DifficultyBar
